name: Control Patrol
description:
The year is 2035. After many riots, the government introduced a "ban on diversity", forcing the population into strict routines and restricting personal interactions.  Interactions create ideas and these ideas can lead to unrest.  Therefore the Control Patrol are needed. In Control Patrol it is your job to patrol the streets of your local neighborhood and keep the peace.  You do this by restricting interactions of the people and "zapping" them if they get too emotional from their interactions. In the time of Control Patrol - Less is More when it comes to the success of our community.

This game was created for the Blackthornprod Game Jam theme - Less is More and completed start to finish in 4 days!  It has been a great project for me to learn more skills to take back into my more polished future projects.

Please leave your feedback so that I can continue the journey...
